description: Flow metrics grouped by the values in an annotation applied to the flows

targets.rawSql:
SELECT sum(ingressBytes) ingressBytes
FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles"
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( annotations['${annotation}'] IN (${subflow}))

SELECT sum(files) ingressBytes
FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles"
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( annotations['${annotation}'] IN (${subflow}))

SELECT time, flow || ' (' || if(empty(subflow),'None',subflow) || ')' AS subflow, bytes " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow, sum(ingressBytes) AS bytes 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( subflow IN (${subflow}))
GROUP BY flow, subflow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT flow, if(empty(subflow),'(none)',subflow) AS subflow, value
FROM(
SELECT flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow, sum(ingressBytes) value 
FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( subflow IN (${subflow}))  
GROUP BY flow, subflow
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10)

SELECT flow, if(empty(subflow),'(none)',subflow) AS subflow, value
FROM(
SELECT flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow, sum(files) value 
FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( subflow IN (${subflow}))  
GROUP BY flow, subflow
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10)

SELECT time, flow || ' (' || if(empty(subflow),'None',subflow) || ')' AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow, sum(files) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( subflow IN (${subflow}))
GROUP BY flow, subflow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT flow || ' ' || subflow AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow, sum(egressed) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( subflow IN (${subflow})) 
GROUP BY flow, subflow)
WHERE values > 0

SELECT time, flow || ' (' || if(empty(subflow),'None',subflow) || ')' AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow, sum(egressed) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( subflow IN (${subflow})) 
GROUP BY flow, subflow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT flow || ' ' || subflow AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow, sum(errored) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( subflow IN (${subflow})) 
GROUP BY flow, subflow)
WHERE values > 0

SELECT time, flow || ' (' || if(empty(subflow),'None',subflow) || ')' AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow, sum(errored) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( subflow IN (${subflow})) 
GROUP BY flow, subflow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT flow || ' ' || subflow AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow, sum(filtered) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( subflow IN (${subflow})) 
GROUP BY flow, subflow)
WHERE values > 0

SELECT time, flow || ' (' || if(empty(subflow),'None',subflow) || ')' AS subflow, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow, sum(filtered) AS values 
FROM deltafi."deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( flow IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( subflow IN (${subflow})) 
GROUP BY flow, subflow, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS tag, sum(ingressBytes) as values
FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and (flow IN (${flow})) AND ( tag IN (${subflow})) 
GROUP BY flow, tag
ORDER BY values DESC

SELECT flow, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotation, sum(files) as files
FROM "deltafi"."deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND (flow IN (${flow})) AND ( annotation IN (${subflow})) 
GROUP BY flow, annotation
ORDER BY files DESC

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT flow FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
list.label: Flow
list.name: flow
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT flow FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT arrayJoin(mapKeys(annotations)) AS keys FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( flow IN (${flow} ) )
list.label: Annotation
list.name: annotation
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT arrayJoin(mapKeys(annotations)) AS keys FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( flow IN (${flow} ) )

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( flow IN (${flow} ) )
list.label: Annotation Value
list.name: subflow
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT annotations['${annotation}'] AS subflow FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( flow IN (${flow} ) )

title: Clickhouse Flow by Annotation
